FireballPy API reference

Release: dev0.0.1 Date: Feb 26, 2024

Fireball

Fireball([infodat])

Python implementation of Fireball QM/MM code.

InfoDat

InfoDat(shells, shellsPP, cutoffPP, cutoffs, ...)

Class to keep all the info present in the classsical info.dat file, needed for the adjusting the different parameters of each specie in the computation
